author: charub
body:
Resolving #2206

Following scenario failed on Linux:
new-psdrive -name TESTDRIVE -root /home/user1/test -psprovider FileSystem
'abc' | set-content -path TESTDRIVE:/testfile.txt

Set-Content fails to create a file for PSDrive path, if the path root begins with defaultPathSeperatorString (ex: UNC path and paths in Single rooted filesystems like Unix)
